original_text: Afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was sixty years old, and she bore him Segub.
korean_text: 그 후에 헤스론이 육십 세에 길르앗의 아버지 마길의 딸에게 장가 들어 동침하였더니 그가 스굽을 헤스론에게 낳아 주었으며

sentences.original_text: Afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 헤스론은 마길의 딸에게 들어갔는데

sentences.original_text: He married her when he was sixty years old
sentences.korean_translation: 헤스론은 육십 세에 그녀를 아내로 맞이했고
